meanings.definition: To decorate an object by gluing paper cutouts onto it.
meanings.sent1: She decoupaged a plain wooden box with colorful pictures.
meanings.sent2: I decoupaged my journal cover with magazine clippings.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to decoupage the curtains with shredded paper.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity decoupaged the room with a burst of colors.
meanings.sent5: The children decoupaged the classroom walls with their artwork.

meanings.definition: The art or technique of decorating an object in this way.
meanings.sent1: Her decoupaged vase was a beautiful addition to the room.
meanings.sent2: I learned the art of decoupaged from my grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The decoupaged table looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His decoupaged creations were displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The museum showcased various decoupaged pieces from different artists.
